original: ABELSON, Birger Leonard, Fabrikör, Nybro, f Kosta 17/3 90 av Johannes Abel Pettersson o Johanna Ljungberg, gm Elin Melcher. Glasslip Kosta glasbr 00—06, anst. Sth glasslip. & speg.fabr 07, Göta livg 08—10, åter Kosta glasbr 11—16, Trondheims glasslip. & speg.fabr 17—19, Orrefors glasbr 20—30, etbl fma Abelssons glas- & kristallsliperi 31. Ordf dräts.kamm, stdflm, styr.led Nybro brunn & badanst, sparbk o koop hdlsfrn. Resor: Norge 17—19, Danm 36.
translated: ABELSON, Birger Leonard, Manufacturer, Nybro, born in Kosta on March 17, 1890, to Johannes Abel Pettersson and Johanna Ljungberg, married to Elin Melcher. Worked at Kosta Glassworks as a glassblower from 1900 to 1906, employed at a glassworks in Stockholm for mirrors from 1907, served in the Göta Life Guard Regiment from 1908 to 1910, returned to Kosta Glassworks from 1911 to 1916, worked at a glassworks in Trondheim for mirrors from 1917 to 1919, worked at Orrefors Glassworks from 1920 to 1930, established Abelsson's Glass and Crystal Grinding Workshop in 1931. Served as chairman of the financial committee, city council, board member of Nybro spa and bathing facility, savings bank, and cooperative trade association. Traveled to Norway from 1917 to 1919, Denmark in 1936.

structured.name: Birger Leonard Abelson
structured.description: Birger Leonard Abelson was a Swedish manufacturer.

career.workplace: Abelsson's Glass and Crystal Grinding Workshop
